video_title: Lee Jae Myung Meets Xi Jinping
topic: south korea's lee jae myung seeks 'new phase' in ties with china at xi jinping meeting

text: South Korea's Lee Jae Myung met with Chinese President Xi Jinping
to discuss a new phase in ties between the two countries
marking a significant development in their diplomatic relations
During their meeting, Lee Jae Myung and Xi Jinping engaged in talks focused on strengthening bilateral cooperation
and exchanging views on key regional and global issues
The meeting was seen as an opportunity for both leaders to reaffirm their commitment
to enhancing mutual understanding and fostering a more stable and cooperative relationship
Details of the specific agreements or outcomes from the meeting have been released
highlighting the two countries' intentions to work together on various fronts
